home.title: Home
home.subtitle: Sample i18n Application!
home.description: This is a sample React Native app demonstrating how to implement internationalization (i18n) using react-i18next. The app allows users to seamlessly switch between multiple languages for a personalized experience.
home.exploringLanguagesDescription: Click on country flags to view the app's content in different languages.
home.repositoryLinkText: Visit the project repository on GitHub
home.homePageMessage: This is the Home page. Click on the top right option to switch to your preferred language.
